Electric Toothbrush with built-in AI: The electric toothbrush with AI technology can analyze and monitor the user's brushing habits, providing personalized feedback on their technique, pressure, and duration. It can also suggest a customized brushing routine based on the user's specific needs and goals.

Electric Toothbrush with UV Light: The electric toothbrush with UV light can help to eliminate cavities and stains by using ultraviolet light to kill bacteria and whiten teeth. This feature can be especially useful for people who have difficulty reaching all areas of their mouth or who have a higher risk of oral health issues.

Electric Toothbrush with Multiple Brushing Modes: The electric toothbrush with multiple brushing modes can offer a variety of brushing experiences, from gentle cleaning to deep cleaning and whitening. Users can switch between modes to suit their individual needs and preferences.

Electric Toothbrush with Timer and Quadrant System: The electric toothbrush with a timer and quadrant system can help users brush for the recommended two minutes and ensure they are brushing all areas of their mouth evenly. The quadrant system can also provide visual feedback on which areas of the mouth need more attention.

Electric Toothbrush with App Integration: The electric toothbrush with app integration can track the user's brushing habits and provide real-time feedback through a mobile app. The app can also offer personalized coaching and recommendations based on the user's brushing patterns and oral health status.
